TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class BluetoothDevice : Java.Lang.Object, Android.OS.IParcelable, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BluetoothDevice extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type BluetoothDevice = class inherit Object interface IParcelable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents a remote Bluetooth device.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: Indicates a low level (ACL) connection has been established with a remote device.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: Indicates a low level (ACL) disconnection from a remote device.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: Indicates that a low level (ACL) disconnection has been requested for a remote device, and it will soon be disconnected.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: Indicates the alias of a remote device has been changed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: Indicates a change in the bond state of a remote device.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: Bluetooth class of a remote device has changed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: Remote device discovered.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: Indicates the friendly name of a remote device has been retrieved for the first time, or changed since the last retrieval.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: This intent is used to broadcast PAIRING REQUEST

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: This intent is used to broadcast the wrapped as a of the remote device after it has been fetched.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the hardware address of this BluetoothDevice.

Docs.summary: Get the Bluetooth alias of the remote device.
Docs.value: the Bluetooth alias, the friendly device name if no alias, or null if there was a problem

Docs.returns: false on immediate error, true if bonding will begin

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothSocket CreateInsecureL2capChannel(int32 psm) cil managed

Docs.param: dynamic PSM value from remote device
Docs.summary: Create a Bluetooth L2CAP Connection-oriented Channel (CoC) that can be used to start a secure outgoing connection to the remote device with the same dynamic protocol/service multiplexer (PSM) value.
Docs.returns: a CoC #BluetoothSocket ready for an outgoing connection

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: on error, for example Bluetooth not available, or insufficient permissions

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothSocket CreateInsecureRfcommSocketToServiceRecord(class Java.Util.UUID uuid) cil managed

Docs.param: service record uuid to lookup RFCOMM channel
Docs.summary: Create an RFCOMM socket ready to start an insecure outgoing connection to this remote device using SDP lookup of uuid.
Docs.returns: a RFCOMM BluetoothServerSocket ready for an outgoing connection

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: on error, for example Bluetooth not available, or insufficient permissions
on error, for example Bluetooth not available, or insufficient permissions
